Languages.Language 1: Deep Speech, understands but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Pincer, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 11 Bludgeoning, Can grapple Large or smaller creatures
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tentacles, One Creature grappled by the Chuul must succeed a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned.  This poison paralyzes the target

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Chuul makes 2 Pincer attacks.  If the Chuul is grappling a creature, the Chuul can also use its tentacles once.

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Chuul can breathe air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Sense Magic, The Chuul can sense magic within 120ft of it at will.  This seems to works like the spell detect magic, but is not magical itself
